word_mean: 用于甲板排水，并能防止污物堵塞管路的附件。

sentence.Network_en: The Scupper Pump failed in the afternoon.
The scupper and outlet pipes are made of steel.
sentence.Network_cn: 排水口和排水管的材料为钢质.

sentence.Network_en: They worry it could be used to scupper merger and acquisition deals.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们担心,《反垄断法》可能被用于阻挠并购交易.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: perhaps via Anglo-Norman French from Old French escopir 'to spit'; compare with German Speigatt, literally 'spit hole'
late 19th cent. (as military slang in the sense 'kill, especially in an ambush'): of unknown origin. The sense 'sink' dates from the 1970s

entry.tran: 彻底破坏(计划、企图);使成泡影
entry.def: To scupper a plan or attempt means to spoil it completely.

example.ex: If Schneider had seen him that would have scuppered all his plans...
example.tran: 如果施奈德看到了他，那他的所有计划都泡汤了。

example.ex: If the Commission has its way, the entire deal will be scuppered.
example.tran: 如果委员会我行我素的话，整个交易将化为泡影。

means.word_mean: 1. drain that allows water on the deck of a vessel to flow overboard
2. put in a dangerous, disadvantageous, or difficult position

auth_sentence.content: More coal-fired stations would scupper our commitments under Kyoto.
auth_sentence.res_content: More coal-fired stations would scupper our commitments under Kyoto.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: More coal-fired stations would scupper our commitments under Kyoto.

auth_sentence.content: It looked as if Mitt's millions would scupper his campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content: It looked as if Mitt's millions would scupper his campaign.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It looked as if Mitt's millions would scupper his campaign.

auth_sentence.content: If they defeat us on certain key clauses they can still scupper the whole bill.
auth_sentence.res_content: If they defeat us on certain key clauses they can still scupper the whole bill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: If they defeat us on certain key clauses they can still scupper the whole bill.

sentences.en: The project was scuppered by lack of money.
sentences.cn: 由于缺乏资金, 这项计划落空了。

sentences.en: Any sponsorship deal would be scuppered if Jones misses the Olympics.
sentences.cn: 如果琼斯不能参加奧运会，赞助商的所有赞助协议都会化成泡影。
